post.author: 이성기
post.content:
We are currently looking for a couple Senior Vitria/Java Consultants for contract work in downtown Toronto.
It is critical that you have worked with Vitria for at least 2 years and have extensive experience with it. A solid background in Java/J2EE technologies is also required.
If you have the above experience please email a Word copy of your resume to jw@etalentgroup.com
thanks.
post.title: a couple Senior Vitria/Java
